description:
Death the Kid’s dealing with a lot: he suspects Joe’s involved with the Magic Tools mystery, and he’s forced into yet another brutal fight with depressed Black☆Star.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Asura`s Temptation: The Big Man`s Uncontrollable Irritation?
La tentazione di Asura! L`incontenibile collera del più grande?
Shura e no Yuuwaku: Big na Otoko no Osaerarenai Iradachi?
Tentation sanglante. L`irrépressible colère du gars le plus géant ?
修羅への誘惑 ~ビッグな男の抑えられない苛立ち?~
